ygData.subject: Re: Hope this isn't too OT..but
ygData.msgSnippet: To add to that... I m sure that connection speed does have a LOT to do with zoning, around September 99, I made the upgrade from a P166, 32mb s, VooDoo II, to
ygData.messageBody:
To add to that...

I'm sure that connection speed does have a LOT to do with zoning, around September '99, I made the upgrade from a P166, 32mb's, VooDoo II, to a P550, 128mb's, VooDoo III. My zone time has been cut from nearly 2 minutes to about 30 seconds. The connection speed helps x-fer any data dealing with non-static items in a given zone. Your system power, is what puts the data on screen, so both would be equally important.

As far as the Riva TNT 2, I wish I had gone with that over my VDIII. It does rock!

Zarbon, 17th Necro E'ci
----- Original Message -----
From: Nat Russo
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 1:00 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Hope this isn't too OT..but


From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>


Personally, I use a Diamond Viper V770D Ultra with 32 megs of video ram. However, I've noticed that the only thing that REALLY effects my zoning speed is my connection speed. A friend of mine and I experimented with this: We have identical machines (PIII 600, 128 Megs of ram, etc...) with ONE difference. I have a 56K modem and he has a DSL connection. On a day with little lag I can zone in 30-45 seconds. My friend, on the other hand, zones in less than 10 seconds.

By the way, I highly recommend the Riva TNT 2 chipset. Totally awesome :)

Mujahid 17 Necro Sol Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: The Shadow [mailto:lovekungfu@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 8:11 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com; EQ-Necromancers@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Hope this isn't too OT..but


From: "The Shadow" <lovekungfu@...>


Hi guys just wanted to ask what your choices are for a graphics card. Right now I have an ATI Rage LT Pro. I've already upgraded to more Ram and zoning just flies by...so any tips are welcome...you can email me directly if the list doesn't want this...email me at Lovekungfu@... Thanks..

Maime Shadowhand, 32 or 31, depending on the group : ( , Chambers of Death, The Rathe
-- Death is the only way out!
